Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 42nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1970...
Earned first career win on 5/28/1975...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/19/1977 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 7/16/1980 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Pittsburgh to New York (N) on 2/5/1981 (Going to PIT: 1B K. Hrbek, RF V. Hayes, CF G. Redus, P B. Holton. Going to NYM: LF G. Matthews Sr., RF H. Kadota, P T. Johnson)...
